{{cpp/atomic/atomic_ref/title|is_always_lock_free}}
{{cpp/atomic/atomic_ref/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
static constexpr bool is_always_lock_free {{=}} /*implementation-defined*/;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Equals {{c|true}} if the operations on this {{tt|atomic_ref}} type is always lock-free and {{c|false}} if it is never or sometimes lock-free.

The value of this constant is consistent with the result of member function {{lc|is_lock_free}}.
